tweet: legal supply horn grows meet global demand price come poacher incentive kill wild privately own dramatically reduce eliminate wouldnt able compete legal enterprise
orig_tweet:
6/8
as the legal supply of rhino horns grows to meet the global demand, the price would come down. poachers' incentive to kill rhinos - wild or privately owned - would be dramatically reduced or eliminated. they wouldn't be able to compete with legal enterprise.

if the trade were legalized, investors would step in to fund rhino ranches like john hume's. the population would grow quickly and significantly - mostly on private ranches.
